SongLyrics.JpnStr: 沈[しず]むように溶[と]けてゆくように
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like sinking and melting away

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 二[ふた]人[り]だけの空[そら]が広[ひろ]がる夜[よる]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the night where only the sky for the two of us expands

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「さよなら」だけだった
SongLyrics.EngStr: It was only 'goodbye'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 其[そ]の一[ひと]言[こと]で全[すべ]てが分[わ]かった
SongLyrics.EngStr: With that one word, I understood everything

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 日[ひ]が沈[しず]み出[だ]した空[そら]と君[きみ]の姿[すがた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The setting sun and your figure against the sky

SongLyrics.JpnStr: フェンス越[ご]しに重[かさ]なっていた
SongLyrics.EngStr: They overlapped beyond the fence

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 初[はじ]めて会[あ]った日[ひ]から
SongLyrics.EngStr: From the day we first met

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]の全[すべ]てを奪[うば]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: You stole all of my heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どこか儚[はかな]い空[くう]気[き]を纏[まと]う君[きみ]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: You, who carries a somewhat ephemeral atmosphere

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 寂[さび]しい目[め]をしてたんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: You were feeling lonely

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何時[いつ]だってチックタックと
SongLyrics.EngStr: In this ticking world

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 鳴[な]る世[せ]界[かい]で何[なん]度[ど]だってさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how many times

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 触[ふ]れる心[こころ]無[な]い言[こと]葉[ば]煩[うるさ]い声[こえ]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Amidst the heartless words and irritating voices

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 涙[なみだ]が零[こぼ]れそうでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if tears are about to spill

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 在[あ]り来[き]たりな喜[よろこ]び屹度[きっと]二[ふた]人[り]なら見[み]つけられる
SongLyrics.EngStr: We can surely find ordinary joy, just the two of us

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 騒[さわ]がしい日[ひ]々[び]に笑[わら]えない君[きみ]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the noisy days, when you can't smile

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 思[おも]い付[つ]く限[かぎり]眩[まぶ]しい明日[あす]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to think of a dazzling tomorrow as much as possible

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 明[あけ]ない夜[よる]に落[お]ちてゆく前[まえ]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Before falling into the dark night,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]の手[て]を掴[つか]んでほら
SongLyrics.EngStr: Take my hand, look

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 忘[わす]れてしまいたくて閉[とじ]込[こめ]た日[ひ]々[び]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the days I wanted to forget and locked away

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 抱[だき]しめた温[ぬく]もりで溶[とか]かすから
SongLyrics.EngStr: I will melt them with the warmth I embraced

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 怖[こわ]くないよ何時[いつ]か日[ひ]が昇[のぼ]るまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Until the day when we're no longer afraid and the sun rises

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 二[ふた]人[り]でいよう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let's be together, just the two of us

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]にしか見[み]えない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can only see you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何[なに]かを見[み]つめる君[きみ]が嫌[きら]いだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I hate the you who gazes at something,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 見[み]惚[と]れているかのような恋[こい]するような
SongLyrics.EngStr: The face that seems to be in love, seems to be captivated,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんな顔[かお]が嫌[きら]いだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I hate that face

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 信[しん]じていたいけど信[しん]じれない事[こと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to believe, but there are things I can't believe

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんなのどうしたって屹度[きっと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter what, surely

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 此[こ]れからだっていくつもあって
SongLyrics.EngStr: From now on, there will be many

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 其[そ]のたんび怒[おこ]って泣[ない]ていくの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Every time, I get angry and cry

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それでも屹度[きっと]何時[いつ]かは屹度[きっと]僕[ぼく]らは屹度[きっと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: But still, surely, someday, surely

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 分[わ]かり合[あ]えるさ信[しん]じてるよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: We will understand each other; I believe that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう嫌[きら]いやだって疲[つか]れたんだって
SongLyrics.EngStr: I hate it, I'm tired of it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 我[が]武[む]者[しゃ]羅[ら]に差[さ]し伸[の]べた僕[ぼく]の手[て]を振[ふ]り払[はら]う君[きみ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: You swatted away my hand that I stretched out desperately

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう嫌[きら]いやだって疲[つか]れたよなんて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I hate it, I'm tired of it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 本[ほん]当[とう]は僕[ぼく]も言[い]いたいんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: To be honest, I want to say the same thing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほらまたチックタックと
SongLyrics.EngStr: Once again, in this ticking world

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 鳴[な]る世[せ]界[かい]で何[なん]度[ど]だってさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: No matter how many times

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の為[ため]に用[よう]意[い]した言[こと]葉[ば]どれも届[とど]かない
SongLyrics.EngStr: None of the words I prepared for you reach you,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「終[おわ]りにしたい」だなんてさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Saying 'I want to end it'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 釣[つ]られて言[こと]葉[ば]にした時[とき]
SongLyrics.EngStr: When I said those words, lured by them,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]は初[はじ]めて笑[わら]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: You smiled for the first time

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 騒[さわ]がしい日[ひ]々[び]に笑[わら]えなくなっていた
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the noisy days, you couldn't smile anymore,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]の目[め]に映[うつ]る君[きみ]は綺[き]麗[れい]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: You, reflected in my eyes, are beautiful,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 明[あけ]ない夜[よる]に溢[こぼ]れた涙[なみだ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the tears overflowing in the dark night

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の笑[え]顔[がお]に溶[と]けていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: They melt into your smiling face

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 変[かわ]らない日[ひ]々[び]に泣[ない]ていた僕[ぼく]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: Me, who was crying in the unchanging days,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]は優[やさ]しく終[おわ]りへと誘[さそ]う
SongLyrics.EngStr: You gently lead, towards the end

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 沈[しず]むように溶[と]けてゆくように
SongLyrics.EngStr: Like sinking, like melting away,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 染[しみ]付[つ]いた霧[きり]が晴[は]れる
SongLyrics.EngStr: The stained mist clears

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 忘[わす]れてしまいたくて閉[とじ]込[こめ]た日[ひ]々[び]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: I take the hand you extended to me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 差[さ]さし伸[の]べてくれた君[きみ]の手[て]を取[と]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the days I wanted to forget and locked away,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 涼[すず]しい風[かぜ]が空[そら]を泳[およ]ぐように今[いま]吹[ふ]き抜[ぬ]けていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: The cool breeze now blows through, swimming in the sky,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 繋[つな]いだ手[て]を離[はな]さないでよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't let go of our connected hands,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 二[ふた]人[り]今[いま]、夜[よる]に駆[か]け出[だ]していく
SongLyrics.EngStr: The two of us, now, will run into the night
